org.framed.orm.ui.editPart

Class ORMModelEditPart

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractGraphicalEditPart
      • org.framed.orm.ui.editPart.ORMModelEditPart

  • public class ORMModelEditPart
extends AbstractGraphicalEditPart
    This EditPart is the controller for the model element Model.
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ORMModelEditPart.ORMModelAdapter
      The Adapter of this EditPart.
      class  ORMModelEditPart.PartFigureBorderExpand
      A border class where a border is drawn at top side of the figure and on the left side of the figure.
      class  ORMModelEditPart.PartFigureBorderNotExpand
      A border class where a border is drawn at top side of the figure.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      protected void createEditPolicies()
      protected org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure createFigure()
      Models have as a figure a ORMRootModelFigure.
      void deactivate()
      Object getAdapter(Class key)
      In this EditPart this method add adapter types for creating a SnapToHelper when the editor is in snapping mode (either to grid or to shapes).
      org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure getContentPane()
      protected List getModelChildren()
      boolean isSelectable()
      The Model shouldn't be selectable, because for that reason we need to override the isSelectable function.
      void refreshVisuals()
      The refreshVisuals of this EditPart updates the borders of the ORMRootModelFigure depending on the expandstate of it's parents figure.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ORMModelEditPart

        public ORMModelEditPart()
        Constructor of this class. In which the class is initialized through calling the constructor of it's parent and initializing it's Adapter.

    • Method Detail

      • createFigure

        protected org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure createFigure()
        Models have as a figure a ORMRootModelFigure. The border of the figure is differs depending on if the parent is a Shape from type Group or a Shape from type comaprtemnt and on the expandstate of the parent figure.

      • isSelectable

        public boolean isSelectable()
        The Model shouldn't be selectable, because for that reason we need to override the isSelectable function.

      • getContentPane

        public org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure getContentPane()

      • createEditPolicies

        protected void createEditPolicies()

      • getModelChildren

        protected List getModelChildren()

      • refreshVisuals

        public void refreshVisuals()
        The refreshVisuals of this EditPart updates the borders of the ORMRootModelFigure depending on the expandstate of it's parents figure.

      • activate

        public void activate()

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()

      • getAdapter

        public Object getAdapter(Class key)
        In this EditPart this method add adapter types for creating a SnapToHelper when the editor is in snapping mode (either to grid or to shapes).
